section.title: Manufacturing: Main
section.para: The default screen is the JobShop menu.

The JobShop is used to manage and track all the manufacturing or assembling work. The work (or job) carried out in the JobShop is called a Production Run. Production Runs can also be called Work Orders.
Production Runs are the work list of the manufacturing department and include details of:

listitem.para: the raw materials or sub assemblies to use
the steps needed to make the finished product

section.title: How do I create a new Production Run?
section.para: Productions Runs can be created manually or automatically. To create one manually:

listitem.para: Click the "Create a Production Run" button

section.title: How do I locate an existing Production Run?
section.para: To locate an existing Production Run

listitem.para: A list of any existing Production Runs will be displayed
Click the Production Run Id to view the Production Run details

section.title: How do I delete a Production Run?
section.para: Production Runs cannot be deleted but they can be cancelled instead.
